price: Wala hawatakuletea mfano wowote, ila na Sisi tutakuletea (jawabu) kwa haki, na tafsiri iliyo bora.
arabic: وَلَا يَأۡتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَحۡسَنَ تَفۡسِيرًا
footnotes: Na wala hawakujii na upinzani dhaifu, ila nasi tunakuletea Haki ya kubainisha, na bora ya maelezo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walā yatūnaka bimathalin illā ji'nāka bil-ḥaqi wa-aḥsana tafsīran
